com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main

Class Contribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main.Contribution

  • public class Contribution
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a contribution, defined by an amount of money given and how often it is given (frequency).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Contribution

        public Contribution(double contribution,
                    Frequency frequency)
             throws BadBudgetInvalidValueException
        Contribution constructor. Verifies values
        Parameters:
        contribution - - amount of the contribution, must be greater (strict) than 0
        frequency - - how often this contribution happens, cannot be null
        Throws:
        BadBudgetInvalidValueException

    • Method Detail

      • verifyValues

        public static int verifyValues(double contrAmount,
                               Frequency freq)
        Verifies a contributions values
        Parameters:
        contrAmount - - the amount of the contr
        freq - - the frequency of the contribution
        Returns:
        an error code indicating various errors that occur: 0 - Values are valid 1 - Contribution amount is not positive 2 - Frequency is null

      • nextContributionDate

        public java.util.Date nextContributionDate(java.util.Date startDate)
        Given a starting date for the last contribution this method returns what the next contribution date would be.
        Parameters:
        startDate - - the date the last contribution occurred
        Returns:
        the next contribution date using this contribution's frequency can return null if a oneTime contribution
